title: Celebrating Our 9th Anniversary With the Cigar of the Year
itunes:title: Celebrating Our 9th Anniversary With the Cigar of the Year
description:
It’s the friggin’ Catalina Wine Mixer! Back in 2010 David Garofalo began the journey of The Cigar Authority and today it is the most listened to cigar podcast in the world. We look back at the journey as we welcome the Vice President of Aganorsa Leaf Terence Reilly to the show.

In the first hour we will light up the 2018 Cigar of the Year that was voted on by listeners of the show, customers and employees of 2GuysCigars.com and the hosts that make up our 2 hour show. It’s the Aganorsa Leaf Connecticut and we share with our thoughts on what makes this cigar so special.

In the second hour of the show we will fire up gifts from a listener and we will let you know who that was on the show. Dave & Barry will fire up an Atabey while Mr. Jonathan & Ed will light up a Byron. We will let you know why the listener chose these cigars as we look back at the glorious history of The Cigar Authority as well as peeking into the future.

Join us on The Cigar Authority, the most listened to cigar podcast in the world. We will have all the usual suspects including Versus, Offer of the Day, Cigar News and a peek into the Asylum.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
